name: Movie Personality Quiz - 25 Questions
description: A curated 25-question subset of the comprehensive movie compatibility quiz, designed to assess viewing preferences, habits, and personality traits for enhanced matching.

cinephile.name: The Cinephile
cinephile.description: Deep appreciation for film as an art form

casual_viewer.name: The Casual Viewer
casual_viewer.description: Enjoys movies for entertainment and relaxation

social_butterfly.name: The Social Butterfly
social_butterfly.description: Prefers watching and discussing with others

critic.name: The Critic
critic.description: Analytical viewer who pays attention to details

collector.name: The Collector
collector.description: Passionate about physical media and memorabilia

instructions.usage: This quiz configuration is used for personality assessment and matching. Questions are referenced from the main QUIZ_QUESTIONS constant in quizQuestions.js.
instructions.scoring: Each answer has a point value. Category scores are normalized to 0-100 scale. Personality archetypes are derived from category score patterns.
instructions.compatibility: Quiz compatibility is calculated by comparing category scores, personality archetypes, and individual answer similarities between users.
